scripts.babelfy: babel src -d dist && minify dist/heartslider.js --out-file dist/heartslider.min.js --mangle false && rm dist/heartslider.js
scripts.version:extract: cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]'
scripts.version:append: echo '/* ❤ HeartSlider 'v$(npm run version:extract --silent)' ❤ */'$(cat dist/heartslider.min.js) > dist/heartslider.min.js && echo '/* ❤ HeartSlider Styles 'v$(npm run version:extract --silent)' ❤ */'$(cat dist/heartslider.min.css) > dist/heartslider.min.css
scripts.build: npm run babelfy && npm run module && postcss src/heartslider.css > dist/heartslider.min.css && npm run version:append
